titleInfo.title: View of the Hilton Nashville Downtown and the AT&T Building in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, 2014 March 15

mods.identifier: LGar Hilton & Batman Bldg Mar15th 2014 b

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: This photograph was taken from the patio of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum (222 5th Ave S), located in downtown Nashville. Several iconic buildings in view include the Hilton Nashville Downtown (121 4th Ave S), the AT&T Building (333 Commerce Street), Regions Bank (One Nashville Place, 150 Fourth Avenue N), Baker Donelson Center (211 Commerce Street), and the CMT Office Building (330 Commerce St). A portion of the Hilton Nashville Downtown and a public park located directly across the street from the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, is pictured in the foreground. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact: Metro Nashville Archives, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5880.
